text: 3.11: Ais 4.4 naŋga, Mal 3.2 naŋga, Jo 1.26-27 naŋga, 1.33 naŋga, Sɨ 1.5 naŋga, 2.3-4 naŋga, 1 Ko 12.13Yi narɨŋ mavɨŋgimɨrumaraŋa vata kukuyɨ mɨŋaŋgɨrundin. Hara kru sɨhɨndɨvu payɨmandɨ hama narɨŋ Gotɨndu Mavɨñɨŋiyɨ naŋga ahumirayɨ mɨŋaŋgɨrumandɨ. Nuŋandɨ tɨkatɨka ha aru sɨkwɨ, yandɨ tɨkatɨka taratɨvɨrandi. Yi avi mɨŋganzɨkwɨ ma, harɨm nuŋandɨ tandambɨsa ha maŋgavuhin.
